CustomField.description: Provide a brief statement (1+P270:P29450 words or less) describing what was achieved in promoting the use of environmentally preferrable products (EPP) based on parameters of the project context - including scope, function, performance, location, availability, and cost.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide a brief statement describing what was achieved in promoting the use of environmentally preferable products (EPP) based on parameters of the project context - including scope, function, performance, location, availability, and cost.
CustomField.label: Environmental Products Narrative
